summary: This bill, H.R. 337, amends the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to provide funding for water management projects. It authorizes the transfer of $3 million annually from unobligated balances for the fiscal years 2026 through 2031. These funds are designated for providing technical and financial assistance for initiatives related to groundwater recharge, aquifer storage, and water source substitution. Introduced with bipartisan support, the bill aims to enhance water resource infrastructure and sustainability, particularly addressing groundwater management challenges.
